nodes.text: The Governor of Naboo chaired the Royal Advisory Council of Naboo. He or she was also tasked with overseeing all matters brought to the monarch's attention, and dealt directly with town governing officials and regional representatives in day-to-day administration.

Sio Bibble served as Governor of Naboo during the invasion of Naboo by the Trade Federation. He had been elected under the rule of Queen Amidala's predecessor King Veruna, and continued to serve Amidala's successors, including Queens Réillata, Jamillia and Neeyutnee. Upon Bibble's retirement from the position around the end of the Clone Wars, former handmaiden and representative in the legislative assembly Saché was heavily favoured to win the election, but it was cancelled by the new Galactic Empire, with Quarsh Panaka instead being appointed Moff of the planet.
In the immediate aftermath of the Battle of Endor, Donta Gesset occupied the since-restored office.
